message.content:
1. Healthy controls showed increased rsFC of the posterior cingulate cortex/precuneus.
2. The increase in rsFC of the posterior cingulate cortex/precuneus was in a specific network.
3. The increase in rsFC of the posterior cingulate cortex/precuneus in healthy controls was relative to the placebo treatment in patients.

messages.content:
Statement: Furthermore, healthy controls revealed increased rsFC of the posterior cingulate cortex/precuneus in this network relative to the placebo treatment in patients.

List all the facts we explicitly know from the statement. Make each fact as atomic as possible.
